pages.text: Allah is Absolute, Eternal, Unique, Self-Sufficient, Perfect, Independent, the Uncaused Cause of all that exists, Besought of all
He begets not, nor is He begotten
And there is none that could be comparable unto Him
Say, "I seek refuge with the Lord of the Rising Dawn
From the evil aspects of created things
And from the evils of the darkness of Ignorance whenever and wherever it is encountered
And from the covert activities of people who try to put knots and complicate the simple
And from the evil of the envious when he envies (and tries to harm)
Say, "I seek refuge with the Lord of Mankind
From the evil of the whispering elusive tempter, the covert desire
That whispers in the hearts of people
(And) from the hidden psyche that rationalizes the evil, as well as the temptations that come from people
